Author: wastedweeds
Text: I'm inpatient for the first time right know. I would say focus on yourself, you are doing it for you. And don't give up. Yes it's scary and lonely at first but it does get better. You've got this!!

Author: sparklypinktutu
Text: If you’re making yourself go, that means you see the problem. Make sure to keep seeing it. That’s why you’re there. To solve the problem. Put yourself through the process, even when you want to reject it. You know that old saying—success is just outside of your comfort zone? Your comfort zone has been the disorder. Recovery will feel uncomfortable, but it’s by putting yourself through that discomfort that you get the life you deserve.
